name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.storage.dir.perm
description:
Permissions for the directories on on the local filesystem where
      the DFS namenode stores the fsImage. The permissions can either be
      octal or symbolic.

name: mapreduce.task.merge.progress.records
description:
The number of records to process during merge before
   sending a progress notification to the MR ApplicationMaster.

name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.namenode-retries
description: Number of retries to use when contacting the namenode when tailing the log.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.high.watermark
description: High watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: dfs.client.refresh.read-block-locations.ms
description: Refreshing LocatedBlocks period. A value of 0 disables the feature.
